name: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3
name_original: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3
description:
The Koopalings have been sent to wreak havoc in the Mushroom World. It's
up to Mario to recover the royal magic wands and restore the kings to
their true forms! Access extra levels by selecting Level Card on the
file-selection screen. Or take a break from the journey, and get in on
some classic Mario Bros. action!
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
